name: Michelle Sandford
tagline: Pioneering ethical AI solutions for social good.
bio: My journey in AI has been driven by a passion to harness technology's potential to create a more equitable and sustainable world. From humble beginnings in Perth, I've dedicated my career to advancing responsible AI that empowers underserved communities.
achievements: Co-founded an AI research lab focused on social impact
Published groundbreaking papers on fair and inclusive AI
Awarded the prestigious 'AI for Good' prize
inspiration: Empower marginalized communities through transformative AI innovations.

milestones.details: Completed PhD in Computer Science, specializing in machine learning for social impact.
Co-founded Inclusive AI Labs, a research institute dedicated to developing ethical and inclusive AI solutions.
Awarded the 'AI for Good' prize for pioneering work on mitigating algorithmic bias in high-stakes decision making.
Joined Microsoft Research to lead the Ethical AI team, focused on responsible AI development for social impact.
